schedule.strategy: Quality over quantity - build returning viewers through episodic series
schedule.posting_philosophy: 5 strategic posts per week aligned with YAML Cron Triggers and data-proven content types

Wednesday.description: The Consistency Slot - Replaces previous Tuesday slot
Wednesday.expected_behavior: High rewatch rate, reference content, save & share
Wednesday.reasoning: YAML Trigger: 0 23 * * 3. Migrated from Tuesday to Wednesday to fit new 5-day flow.

Thursday.description: The Mid-Week High - AI tool demonstrations
Thursday.current_performance: Combined with Tuesday data: 64.72% avg at OLD times
Thursday.expected_behavior: Same as Wednesday - high reference value, rewatches
Thursday.reasoning: YAML Trigger: 0 22 * * 4. Adjusted from 21:00 to 22:00 for optimal evening reach.
Thursday.alternative_option: SECRET PROMPTS after format pivot to ChatGPT-specific prompts

Friday.description: The Viral Slot - Entertainment-focused AI content
Friday.expected_behavior: New viewer acquisition, viral potential, shares
Friday.reasoning: YAML Trigger: 0 23 * * 5. YOUR data shows Friday is BEST day + 23:00 is BEST time.
Friday.quality_gate: ONLY entertainment/shock-value AI stories. Reject generic news.
Friday.timezone_note: 23:00 UTC = 6:00 PM EST Friday (weekend starts, high engagement)
Friday.replaces: Saturday AI News Roundup (killed for 32.21% underperformance)

Sunday.description: The Early Weekend Slot - Testing new formats
Sunday.reasoning: YAML Trigger: 0 18 * * 0. New slot for A/B testing.

Sunday.description: The Sunday Prep Slot - Productivity & Planning
Sunday.expected_behavior: Getting ready for the week ahead
Sunday.reasoning: YAML Trigger: 0 21 * * 0. High engagement for productivity content.

tool_teardown_wednesday.hook_structure: Show visual transformation in first 3 seconds (PROVEN on Text-to-3D)
tool_teardown_wednesday.cta: Next Thursday: [Teaser for next tool]. Subscribe so you don't miss it!
required_elements: Before/after visual comparison (CRITICAL - Text-to-3D had 461.73% because of this)
Specific tool name in title (NOT 'this AI tool')
examples: Tool Teardown Wednesday - Episode 5: Midjourney's SECRET Parameter Creates Perfect Images!
Tool Teardown Wednesday - Episode 6: Notion's HIDDEN AI Builds Your Workflow in 60 Seconds!

tool_teardown_thursday.hook_structure: IDENTICAL to Wednesday - show visual transformation in first 3 seconds
tool_teardown_thursday.cta: Next Wednesday: [Teaser for next tool]. Friday I reveal [entertainment teaser]!
required_elements: SAME as Wednesday - different tool, same proven format
examples: Tool Teardown Thursday - Episode 5: ChatGPT's HIDDEN Code Interpreter Magic!
Tool Teardown Thursday - Episode 6: Runway Gen-3's SECRET Video Editing Feature!

differentiation_from_wednesday.rule: Cover DIFFERENT tools, not different formats

example_week.wednesday: Midjourney SECRET Parameter for Perfect Faces

differentiation_from_wednesday.avoid: Do not make Thursday different format - make it SAME FORMAT, different tool

sunday_prep.hook_structure: Problem statement ('Dreading Monday?') -> AI Solution in 3s
sunday_prep.cta: See you Wednesday for the Tool Teardown!
required_elements: Calm, prepared vibe (contrast to Friday energy)
examples: Weekly Prep - Episode 1: Automate Your Monday Emails!
Weekly Prep - Episode 2: AI Plan Your Entire Week in 5 Mins

experimental_sunday.hook_structure: Question format or pure visual hook
experimental_sunday.cta: Comment if this worked for you
required_elements: Testing grounds for new 'Viral Friday' concepts

viral_ai_friday.hook_structure: Lead with the shocking/entertaining moment in first 3 seconds, explain after
viral_ai_friday.cta: Wednesday: [Related practical tool]. Follow for the full breakdown!
required_elements: Shock value or entertainment angle (not just news)
Immediate WTF moment in first 3 seconds
Personal impact (how it affects viewer TODAY)
Bridge to Wednesday's related tool demo
examples: Viral AI Friday - Episode 1: Rizzbot FLIPPED ME OFF on TikTok LIVE!
Viral AI Friday - Episode 2: Adobe AI Now RUNS Your Entire Social Media!
Viral AI Friday - Episode 3: AWS Outage Gave AI Literal Brain Rot!
exclusion_criteria: NO generic news without entertainment value
NO 'failed products' stories (proven 31.81% on video_id: fU8DgDdmRl4)

bridge_to_wednesday.rule: Always connect Friday entertainment to Wednesday practical tool
examples: Rizzbot went viral → Wednesday: ChatGPT SECRET Conversation Tricks
Adobe AI automation → Wednesday: Adobe Express HIDDEN Features

secret_prompts_thursday.hook_structure: Show ChatGPT prompt on screen + immediate result in first 3 seconds
secret_prompts_thursday.cta: Episode [N+1] next Thursday reveals the [TEASER]! Subscribe now!
required_elements: Episode number MUST be in title
EXACT ChatGPT prompt visible on screen (copy-paste ready)
Specific use case (Email, Meetings, Content, Code)
examples: SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 1: ChatGPT's Email Mastery Prompt!
SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 2: ChatGPT's Meeting Notes Automation!
SECRET PROMPTS - Episode 3: ChatGPT's Code Debugging Secret!

success_metrics.proven_format_baseline: 50-60% when using ChatGPT-specific format (video_ids: ut5wl2k_8bg, Wwp35tN5amY)

AVOID_AT_ALL_COSTS: Vague productivity angles without specific demo

ai_news_roundup.status: ⚠️ KILLED - Replaced by Viral AI Friday
ai_news_roundup.proven_performance: 32.21% avg completion (8 videos) - UNDERPERFORMED baseline by 17.8%
ai_news_roundup.reason_for_killing: Generic news (32.21%) performs 2.5x worse than entertainment (80.69%). Audience wants entertainment/practical tools, NOT news.

best_example.title: Google's AI Project Chronos Pulled: Defamation Lawsuit Looms!

worst_examples.title: Microsoft AI Agents FAILED: Project Nexus Shocking Truth!
worst_examples.why_failed: Negative framing, no entertainment or practical value

ai_news_roundup.replacement: Viral AI Friday - Entertainment-focused stories that perform 80.69% (2.5x better)

scheduling_notes.github_actions_reality: Delays of 0-120 minutes are normal and EXPECTED
scheduling_notes.window_strategy: 3-hour windows absorb delays while hitting target audience peak

optimal_times_proven.23:00_UTC: 6:00 PM EST - BEST TIME (82.1% completion, 10 videos sample)
optimal_times_proven.21:00_UTC: 4:00 PM EST - After-work peak (57.9% completion, 5 videos sample)
optimal_times_proven.22:00_UTC: 5:00 PM EST - Evening start (57.4% completion, 6 videos sample)

killed_times.14:00_UTC: 9:00 AM EST - WORST TIME (34.0% completion, 3 videos sample)

why_these_days.wednesday: The Consistency Slot - Replaces Tuesday to fit new 5-day cadence. Proven 82.1% success potential at 23:00 UTC.
why_these_days.thursday: Mid-week engagement + after-work timing (Adjusted to 22:00 UTC) + builds anticipation for Friday
why_these_days.friday: BEST DAY by analytics (77.63% avg) + BEST TIME (82.1% at 23:00 UTC) = maximum viral potential
why_these_days.sunday: Two slots (18:00 & 21:00) to capture weekend prep crowd and experiment with new formats.

why_5_posts_strategy.problem: Daily posting = 99.7% new viewers (no retention, burnout)
why_5_posts_strategy.solution: 5 strategic posts = High frequency without quality drop
why_5_posts_strategy.math: 5 quality posts at 65% completion > 7 mediocre posts at 30% completion
why_5_posts_strategy.data_proof: Tool Teardown (episodic) = 64.72% avg vs Generic Daily Hacks = 22.3% avg

evening_vs_morning_data.insight: US audience (58.3%) watches YouTube evenings (after work/dinner), NOT mornings

analytics_validation.method: YouTube Analytics API hour-level completion tracking
analytics_validation.key_finding: Evening posts (21:00-23:00 UTC) average 65.8% completion vs morning posts (14:00-15:00 UTC) 34.0%

proven_best_days.reasoning: Highest day performance + weekend starts + evening timing = maximum viral potential
Proven content format (64.72%) + proven best time (82.1%) = highest consistency
Mid-week engagement + after-work window + builds Friday anticipation

worst_days.note: Insufficient isolated day data, but morning times (14:00-15:00 UTC) consistently underperform across all days

expected_results.sunday: Establish new baseline for experimental content

phase_3_OPTIMIZE.action: Fine-tune Sunday formats based on performance data
focus_areas: Measure impact of 5-day load on viewer retention

rollback_plan.trigger: If ANY time slot posts <40% completion for 2 consecutive weeks
rollback_plan.action: Revert THAT time slot to nearest proven time (21:00, 22:00, or 23:00 UTC)
rollback_plan.note: Rollback to 15:00 UTC NOT an option - proven 34.0% failure

cron_update_timing.status: Updated to 5 distinct slots: Wed 23:00, Thu 22:00, Fri 23:00, Sun 18:00, Sun 21:00

analytics_reference.data_source: YouTube Analytics API backfill (83 videos, Oct 12 - Nov 8, 2025)
analytics_reference.confidence_level: HIGH (26 videos for tool_teardown, 8 for news, proven patterns)

proven_baselines.ai_news_roundup: 32.21% completion (KILLED - replaced by Viral AI Friday)
proven_baselines.viral_entertainment: 80.69% completion (proven on Rizzbot, now Viral AI Friday)
